message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $115. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $105 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $110.  This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. Let's close the deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Can you meet me at $108? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but I'm sure you'll agree this product is worth the investment!  Let's split the difference.  I'm willing to accept $109.  This is the absolute lowest I can go, so let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Can you meet me at $107? I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob,  I'm going to be upfront - $107 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you in the middle one last time, at $108.  This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll agree it's a fair price for this incredible product.

I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to make one last compromise - can you meet me at $106? I really like the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
